traits.name: HAZARD MITIGATION ROUTINES
traits.description: The Pandora reduces all incoming damage by the number of conditions currently affecting it, to a minimum of 1.

synergies.detail: The Pandora reduces all incoming damage by the number of conditions currently affecting it, to a minimum of 1.

traits.name: MALEDICTIVE MERCY
traits.description: Whenever the Pandora hits a target with a weapon attack, it may remove all conditions from the target and apply them to itself until the end of its next turn.

core_system.name: PITHOS MIMICRY VIRUS
core_system.active_effect: Until the end of the current scene, you become immune to all negative effects of all conditions, but may still gain conditions as normal.

traits.name: HAZARD EXPLOITATION ROUTINES
traits.description: The Grendel has Resistance to all damage dealt by a character currently affected by a condition.

synergies.detail: The Grendel has Resistance to all damage dealt by a character currently affected by a condition.

traits.name: SIDESWIPES
traits.description: Knockback the Grendel applies with a melee attack may be in any non-vertical direction, not just directly away from it.

traits.name: DIRE IMPACT
traits.description: When the Grendel inflicts Knockback, it may remove all conditions from the target to increase the Knockback by the number of conditions removed.

core_system.name: INFRASONIC EMITTERS
core_system.active_effect: All enemies within Burst 2 must make a Systems save or become Impaired until the end of their next turn. For the rest of the scene, you gain the Echoing Roar protocol.

active_actions.name: Echoing Roar
active_actions.detail: All enemies within Burst 1 must make a Systems save or become Impaired until the end of their next turn.

traits.name: PITCH MUNITIONS
traits.description: Whenever the Faust deals damage with a weapon attack to a target that already has any Burn, the target must make a Hull save or take 1 Burn.

traits.name: GIFT OF FLAMES
traits.description: Once per round, when the Faust takes Burn, it may choose a character within Sensors to make a Hull save or take the Burn instead of it.

actions.name: CRUEL GIFT
actions.detail: A character within Sensors must make a Hull save or take the Burn instead of you.

traits.name: DRAGGED TO HELL
traits.description: When the Faust suffers reactor meltdown, it does not deal any Explosive Damage. Instead, characters within Burst 2 must make an Agility save or take 6d6 Burn. On a success, they take half damage.

core_system.name: RADIATION DIFFUSAL SHUNT
core_system.active_effect: For the rest of the scene, gain the Fell Pact reaction.

active_actions.name: Fell Pact
active_actions.detail: A character within Sensors must make a Hull save or take the Heat instead of you.

traits.name: HAZARD COMPOUNDING ROUTINES
traits.description: The Pandora gains +1 accuracy on Tech Attacks if the target has at least one condition.

actions.name: UNHEEDED PROPHECY
actions.trigger: A character within Sensors has been hit by an attack and damage has been rolled.
actions.detail: The target is treated as having Resistance to all Damage, Burn, and Heat from the triggering attack. Until the start of the target's next turn, all attacks against them are made at +1 difficulty. If the target has any traits or systems that modify the Brace reaction, the target is considered to have Braced. You cannot take reactions until the end of your next turn, and on that turn can only take one quick action, as if you had Braced.

core_system.name: PRECOGNITION ENGINE
core_system.active_effect: For the rest of the scene, Visions of Weal and Visions of Woe only remove the mark from the character chosen, and not from other characters within Sensors.
core_system.passive_effect: Whenever you invade a character that has a condition, you may remove one condition from the target and mark them until the end of the scene.

passive_actions.name: Visions of Weal
passive_actions.detail: A character within Sensors gains Overshield equal to twice the number of marks within Sensors, up to a limit of 10 Overshield. Remove all marks within Sensors that you applied.

passive_actions.name: Visions of Woe
passive_actions.detail: A character within Sensors takes Burn equal to the number of marks within Sensors, up to a limit of 5 Burn. Remove all marks within Sensors that you applied.

traits.name: WARP SCRAMBLERS
traits.description: After the Timur teleports, it may teleport any character within Burst 1 to any other location within Burst 1. Unwilling targets may make an Engineering save to resist this effect.

actions.name: BLINK-VIGILANT
actions.trigger: You are hit by a weapon attack.
actions.detail: You may teleport to an unoccupied location adjacent to the attacker before resolving the attack. If the attack was a Line, Cone, Burst, or Blast attack and the location you teleport to is not within the area of the attack, you have Resistance to all damage, Heat, and Burn from the attack.

core_system.name: ORBITAL BLINK ANCHOR
core_system.active_effect: For the rest of the scene, gain the Orbital Blink action.

active_actions.name: ORBITAL BLINK
active_actions.detail: Remove yourself from the map, allowing you to use Tactical Insertion again.

core_system.passive_effect: You do not start scenes deployed to the map, and instead have the Tactical Insertion protocol.

passive_actions.name: Tactical Insertion
passive_actions.detail: If you are not on the map and have at least one structure, teleport yourself to an unoccupied space on the map.

traits.name: ANNOUNCE THE DECREE
traits.description: Whenever the Herald grants Overshield to another character, it increases its current Overshield by 1 up to a maximum of 12, or gains Overshield 1 if it does not have any.

traits.name: WRIT OF AUTHORITY
traits.description: While the Herald has Overshield, it has Resistance to all damage, and line of sight may not be drawn through it.

core_system.name: IMPERIAL VOICE
core_system.active_effect: The Banner Nexus gains the Banner Raised profile for the rest of the scene.

actions.name: FOR THE LIEGE
actions.detail: Choose one ally within Sensors. That ally gains Overshield equal to the Regent's current Overshield.

traits.name: NEITHER BLADE NOR POINT NOR STONE
traits.description: If the Regent takes the Brace action, and still has Overshield remaining after taking damage, its next turn is unaffected by the Brace action.

core_system.name: REGAL PANOPLY
core_system.active_effect: For the rest of the scene, you gain the Challenge reaction.

active_actions.name: Challenge
active_actions.trigger: An ally within Sensors is hit by an attack.
active_actions.detail: The attacker is marked until the end of the scene. Marked characters take +2 Difficulty on all attacks that do not include you as a target.

name: BOUDICA
description: Designed in the field by a team of [Redacted] operators stranded on the planet of [Redacted] during a crisis response mission, the Boudica is a thorough refit of an outdated Harrison Armory Barbarossa precursor using technology ripped from a modern Monarch chassis. This frame is designed to serve as a mobile base of operations when operating behind enemy lines or far away from any of the creature comforts personnel might expect from a base or camp. In order to expand the Barbarossa’s already considerable frame, the massive Apocalypse rail had to be removed and the proto-Barbarossa’s impressive armor had to be reduced to allow it to cover the greater mass. [Redacted] compensated for the Apocalypse Rail’s removal by developing the RWDR system and paired it with an NHP designed from [Redacted] to allow it to still serve as a potent artillery piece when battle is joined. A colonist by the name of [Redacted] almost fully replaced the Boudica’s outdated computer and sensor system with those of the Monarch making it a force to be reckoned with on the modern battlefield. It must be noted that the Boudica is a violation of Harrison Armory and Smith-Shimano intellectual property. Printing the Boudica is a crime under international law, and the print shop, operators, and any license holders may be held legally responsible.

traits.name: FORWARD OPERATING SUITE
traits.description: The Boudica has a command bridge large enough for a pilot and non-mech passenger, a head, and a number of additional rooms equal to its size staffed by a crew equal to its size. As a Protocol, the crew onboard the Boudica may perform either a Scan, Lock On, or Bolster Quick Tech Action.

traits.name: BEHEMOTH
traits.description: Allies may end their movement within the Boudica's spaces and adjacent allies may use it as Hard Cover. The Boudica cannot take the Hide action, nor benefit from Invisibility.

traits.name: HEAVY FRAME
traits.description: The Boudica can't be pushed, pulled, knocked prone, or knocked back by smaller characters.

traits.name: SLOW
traits.description: The Boudica receives +1 difficulty on Agility checks and saves.

core_system.name: AGINCOURT Rapid Warhead Deployment Rail
core_system.description: An experimental pairing of a modified Apocalypse Rail and the Monarchs HPMS, the AGINCOURT uses a magnetic rail system to deploy dozens of missiles paired with copies of the EROS class NHP. The Missiles remain unfired in the air until the NHP activates them all simultaneously, guiding them all individually to cause maximum damage. The EROS copies enjoy this and are incapable of remorse, fear, or dread.
core_system.active_effect: When activated, you begin charging the Boudica's Agincourt Rail. Gain a Volley Die, a 1d6 starting at 1. At the start of each of your turns, raise the value of the Volley Die by 1, to a maximum of 6. If you move (even involuntarily) or become Stunned or Jammed, the Volley Die resets to 1 and then continues to count up as usual. After an attack with the Agincourt Rail, the Volley Die resets to 1. At the end of the scene, lose the Volley Die.
